metadata.title: RHSA-2022:6522: .NET Core 3.1 on RHEL 7 security and bugfix update (Moderate)
metadata.description:
.NET is a managed-software framework. It implements a subset of the .NET framework APIs and several new APIs, and it includes a CLR implementation.

New versions of .NET that address a security vulnerability are now available. The updated versions are .NET SDK 3.1.423 and .NET Runtime 3.1.29.

Security Fix(es):

* dotnet: DenialOfService - ASP.NET Core MVC vulnerable to stack overflow via ModelStateDictionary recursion. (CVE-2022-38013)

For more details about the security issue(s), including the impact, a CVSS score, acknowledgments, and other related information, refer to the CVE page(s) listed in the References section.

bugzilla.text: CVE-2022-38013 dotnet: DenialOfService - ASP.NET Core MVC vulnerable to stack overflow via ModelStateDictionary recursion.

platform: .NET Core on Red Hat Enterprise Linux
